name: Crab Fight
description:
A Blue crab called "M" finds a poor child with unknown parents and calls him RED!

"M" lives in a jungle next to lots of Orange crabs and makes weapons out of shells for the King Crocodile and his soldiers! He has promised the king not to use his magic powers to hurt anyone .One day he let You/"Red" to go out and play with others.  Can you be a good crab or the orange crabs will go on you nerves?

This is my First indie game!

I need your help to test it and  make it better!
